long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amplify the powers of your cloud communications system by integrating it with the Pipedrive CRM.

Enjoy instant access to calling and messaging capabilities and reach out to leads and clients effortlessly.

Leverage your CRM dashboard to ramp up your customer relationship management. Update lead status, save follow-up details and activities, and keep track of the customer journey. 

What’s more—stay armed with relevant information always. Deploy CTI pop-ups to receive contextual information before interacting with leads and customers. And get a 36-degree view of agent and business performance results.
